text: Ina Balin (née Rosenberg; November 12, 1937 – June 20, 1990) was an American actress. She is best known for her role in the movie From the Terrace (1960), for which she won a Golden Globe Award. Balin was born in New York City. Balin died on June 20, 1990 in New Haven, Connecticut of lung disease, aged 52. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Deaths from lung disease Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Ina Balin
